words.definition: To change something.
words.example: I had to alter my plans because of the rain.

words.definition: On or to one side.
words.example: He put the book aside and started to sleep.

words.definition: The season between summer and winter.
words.example: The leaves turn brown in autumn.

words.definition: To mix two or more things together.
words.example: Blend the milk and sugar to make the cake.

words.definition: To fall down suddenly.
words.example: The old building collapsed during the earthquake.

words.definition: To press something very hard.
words.example: He crushed the empty can with his hand.

words.definition: A line that bends smoothly.
words.example: The road has many dangerous curves.

words.definition: Very unpleasant.
words.example: The smell of the garbage was disgusting.

words.definition: To let liquid flow away.
words.example: The water drained out of the sink.

words.definition: To hug someone.
words.example: The mother embraced her child.

words.definition: To wish you had what someone else has.
words.example: I envy his success in business.

words.definition: Objects that explode with light and noise.
words.example: The fireworks were beautiful at night.

words.definition: Powder made from wheat used for baking.
words.example: We need flour to make bread.

words.definition: A string that carries fire to an explosive.
words.example: The boy lit the fuse of the firework.

words.definition: A spicy root used in cooking.
words.example: Ginger makes the tea taste better.

words.definition: Feeling unhappy because of someone's success.
words.example: She was jealous of her friend's new dress.

words.definition: A thick, soft substance.
words.example: Use this paste to stick the paper.

words.definition: A paper showing you paid for something.
words.example: Always keep your receipt after buying things.

words.definition: To slide a cloth over something to clean it.
words.example: Please wipe the table after eating.

words.definition: A thin thread of metal.
words.example: The electric wire is broken.
